faq.title: 6 months 50% off
faq.body: Start saving with a 24-month Sim Only plan. For 6 months, you’ll receive a 50% discount on each of your monthly bills! You can adjust your data bundle and add-ons during these 6 months. For example, if you have 5 GB and unlimited calling for €5 and change your bundle to 10GB and unlimited calling, then you will pay €6,50 the next month. Check terms and conditions here.

faq.title: Sim Only rates
faq.body: Want to know more about our (international) Sim Only rates? Check out our rates page.

faq.title: Prepaid rates
faq.body: Want to know more about our (international) Prepaid rates? Check out our rates page.

faq.title: Replacing your SIM card
faq.body: If your SIM card is lost, broken, stolen or not suitable for 4G then we will transfer your current Lebara phone number and credit to a new SIM card for free.

faq.title: SIM card details
faq.body: Your PIN code, PUK code and ICCID are on the card your SIM card comes in. Have you lost this card? You can always request these codes from customer services.
